review: I am SO glad hubby talked me into this! I almost didn't let him get it, but it replaced this huge thing he had before, I think Google tv? It works fast, and very rarely ever have we had to reboot it because of an issue. The remote is small and gets lost easily, but I'd rather it be small than something massive. The price is really great too!

Otherwise, it's all it's cracked up to be and is a great source of entertainment in my family!!!!
